meanings: G up is similair to the phrase "fire it up" It refers to becoming prepared; to bring your A game; or go balls to the wall.
a slang term used on the popular online ps2 game socom used when inpatient people want you to "green up" "g-ing up" or "greening up" is the action of switching your status to ready.
be sick and tired of fear

vlive.korean: [겁은 조금 많지만 어어ㅓㅓ엄청 똑똑한 우리 까미 보고 가세요] 까미 앉아! [He may be easily scared but he's really smart] Ggami, sit! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 현진 : 현이, 지독한 짝사랑
vlive.english: [He may be easily scared but he's really smart] Ggami, sit!

vlive.korean: 정말 겁이 많으니까... Because I'm kind of a coward. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.27 세봉이의 상상은 현실이 된다 #1
vlive.english: Because I'm kind of a coward.

vlive.korean: 5명 다 겁 엄청 많아서 돌아! Five of us are scaredy-cats... Roll! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 도망갈까..! 🏃
vlive.english: Five of us are scaredy-cats... Roll!

vlive.korean: "유타는 왜 겁이 없어요?" "YUTA, why aren't you afraid of anything?" 듣기 View video NCT : 여러분 뭐해요??? ^^
vlive.english: "YUTA, why aren't you afraid of anything?"

vlive.korean: 얼른 뽑아요 겁이 그렇게 많아서 되겠나! Hurry up and choose one. You're so easily scared! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : [Full]'IDOL RADIO' ep#402. 마법의 가든 (스페셜 DJ 투모로우바이투게더 태현 w.투모로우바이투게더)
vlive.english: Hurry up and choose one. You're so easily scared!
